content: As Ken noted, mortgage banking-related income increased $2.5 million quarterly as lower production volume and a decline in net gain on loans originated and sold was offset by a rise in loan servicing revenue as rising interest rates and falling prepayment speeds benefit MSR valuations, net of hedges and servicing income.
